body:
## Release Notes

This release adds official support for Python 3.11, including using the built-in tomllib instead of the third-party tomli, when available.

## What's Changed
* FIX: handle unset versionfile_build in build_ext by @mgorny in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/347
* ENH: support built-in tomllib for Python 3.11+ by @mgorny in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/348

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/compare/0.27...0.28

## Release Notes

This release fixes a bug with non-isolated builds of Versioneer and for packages that provide their own `sdist` command.

With thanks to Dimitri Papadopoulos and Michal Gorny for contributions.

## What's Changed

* FIX: Always bootstrap in setup.py to avoid incompatibility with old versioneer by @mgorny (#344)
* FIX: Mixup between `_egg_info` and `_sdist` by @DimitriPapadopoulos (#342)
* STY: Merge `endswith` checks by @DimitriPapadopoulos (#337)
* STY: Useless inheritance from object by @DimitriPapadopoulos (#336)
* CI: python-version should be a string, not a float by @DimitriPapadopoulos (#340)
* CI: Automatically update GitHub Actions in the future by @DimitriPapadopoulos (#341)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/compare/0.26...0.27

## What's Changed
* MNT: Relicense to Unlicense by @effigies in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/317
* ENH: in verbose mode do not hide stderr of git rev-parse by @yarikoptic in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/318
* DOC: clarify upgrading to 0.23 doesn't require special actions by @sappelhoff in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/321
* ENH: Prepare for py2exe dropping distutils support by @effigies in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/319
* ENH: Allow versioneer to be used as a module in PEP-518 mode by @effigies in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/294

## New Contributors
* @sappelhoff made their first contribution in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/321

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/compare/0.23...0.24

## What's Changed
* MNT: Drop 3.6 support, remove old hacks by @effigies in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/288
* Clarify license as CC0-1.0 by @BastianZim in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/292
* MNT: Drop distutils by @effigies in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/289
* FIX: Restore py_modules field to setup.py by @effigies in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/293
* Update URL of tox by @DimitriPapadopoulos in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/295
* CI: Update Windows image to latest by @effigies in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/290
* FIX: skip version update on `build_ext` if .py does not exist by @mgorny in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/297
* FIX: old GIT (<1.7.2) does not know about `--count` flag by @foxtran in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/306
* FIX: Use only numeric versions in Git, ignore other tags with the same prefix by @effigies in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/256
* Undefined name: VersioneerBadRootError on line 51 by @cclauss in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/305
* MNT: Disable editable installs of versioneer (they will not work) by @effigies in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/307
* FIX: Handle missing tag_prefix gracefully by @effigies in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/308
* ENH: Patch versioneer files into manifest at runtime by @effigies in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/309
* CI: Update gh-actions PLATFORM variable to avoid double-testing by @effigies in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/311
* Adequate custom `build_py` command to changes in setuptools v64 by @abravalheri in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/313
* Appease flake8 by @simaoafonso-pwt in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/312

## New Contributors
* @BastianZim made their first contribution in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/292
* @mgorny made their first contribution in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/297
* @foxtran made their first contribution in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/306
* @cclauss made their first contribution in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/305
* @abravalheri made their first contribution in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/313
* @simaoafonso-pwt made their first contribution in https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/pull/312

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/python-versioneer/python-versioneer/compare/0.22...0.23
